breadcrumb.delivery: All completed deliveries of the company

cards.title: Order a product/service
cards.text: Contact our manager, discuss the order details

cards.title: We prepare documents
cards.text: Approval of technical parameters, development of design documentation and detailed documentation, provision for approval and receipt of a stamp for production

cards.title: Monitoring of all processes
cards.text: Monitoring of all production processes, acceptance of raw materials and materials

cards.title: Preparing for delivery
cards.text: We prepare and conduct pre-shipment tests of goods and equipment

cards.title: We deliver across the Republic of Uzbekistan
cards.text: After inspection and agreement with the client, we deliver the special. machinery, goods and equipment throughout the Republic of Uzbekistan

cards.title: You receive an order
cards.text: Specialist. machinery, goods or equipment is delivered to your company

help.title: Didn't find the right product?
help.txt: Contact our manager in a convenient way for you

info.title: For 4 years on the market, we have become the largest distributors of the industrial sector of the country
info.txt1: The company was founded in 2018 and is one of the largest in Uzbekistan, not only a supplier shut-off and control valves, but also many industrial products and services.

desc.txt3: always pays special attention to product quality and corporate reputation, adheres to a quality survival policy, and closely monitors the ordering and delivery process.

cards.title: Individual approach to each customer
cards.text: We start by knowing our customers' goals and expectations and use that information to tailor our services and products to meet their needs

cards.title: Well-established work on the passage of all stages
cards.text: At {company}, we have implemented a streamlined process that ensures a seamless experience from start to finish

cards.title: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week in touch with clients
cards.text: We offer 24/7 customer support, so you can contact us any time of the day or night

cards.title: Favorable cooperation conditions
cards.text: We understand that building successful partnerships with our clients is essential to achieving mutually beneficial outcomes

cards.title: Quality assurance of services and goods
cards.text: We are committed to providing our customers with the best possible service and we believe that our quality and service assurance is an important part of achieving this goal

cards.title: Huge range of products and services from market leaders
cards.text: We offer a wide range of products and services from market leaders to ensure that our customers have access to the most advanced and reliable solutions on the market

title.two: trusted by more than 10 large companies

partners.txt: More than 10 large companies in the industry trust us and have not regretted it so far. We work with market leaders, advanced companies and professionals. Dozens of successfully completed projects on time and hundreds of satisfied people speak for our company.

contacts.title: Central offices of the company in the regions
